jobs_results.title: Mid/Senior Android Developer (3 months)
jobs_results.description:
ABOUT THE COMPANY:

Join ADDENDUM, a global software development and IT team augmentation firm focusing on fintech, banking, and telco industries. Experience tailored benefits, diverse projects with various tech stacks, and opportunities for growth, freedom, and responsibility you desire.

ABOUT THE ROLE:

Whether you're in the heart of the Baltics or anywhere else, you'll join forces with dedicated professionals in the banking sector. Together, you'll work on exciting projects that focus on advancing and supporting the development of a mobile application. This is a contract-based role for a duration of 3 months.

WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING:
‚Ä¢ Develop high-quality native Android applications using Java and/or Kotlin.
‚Ä¢ Design and implement solutions that prioritize performance, security, and exceptional user experience.
‚Ä¢ Stay updated with and apply the latest trends and best practices in user interface and user experience design.
‚Ä¢ Maintain high code quality standards while actively sharing knowledge with the team.
‚Ä¢ Provide mentorship and guidance to junior Android developers.

WHAT WE EXPECT:
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in developing native Android applications.
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of Android architecture, design patterns, and best practices for app development.
‚Ä¢ Expertise in creating secure, high-performance solutions with a focus on user experience (UX) and user interface (UI).
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of modern tools and practices, including version control systems (e.g., Git) and Agile methodologies.
‚Ä¢ Attention to detail in maintaining clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
‚Ä¢ Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset to share knowledge and contribute to team success.

WHAT WE OFFER:

Salary ranges: 20 eur/hour - 35 eur/hour (the given range is flexible and depends on your experience).

At Addendum we believe in personalized benefits packages that cater to your unique passions. Tell us what drives you, and we'll craft a package accordingly. On top of that, heres whats in store automatically:
‚Ä¢ Flexible Hours: No more 9-to-5; work when you're at your best.
‚Ä¢ Top Talent Collaboration: Join award-winning teams from different countries.
‚Ä¢ Diverse, Challenging Projects: Break free from the ordinary with dynamic, stimulating work.
‚Ä¢ Epic Team Events: Join us for summer and winter parties and online events.
‚Ä¢ Special Celebrations: We love a good shindig for birthdays and project milestones.

And if you want to turn up the volume even more, here's what you can additionally have:
‚Ä¢ Rock star Benefits: From health and wellness to tech gadgets, we've got it covered.
‚Ä¢ Flexible Work Options: You choose your work style: from the office to a beach in Bali.
‚Ä¢ Healthy Work-Life Balance: Easy sick-leave and unlimited work-from-home options.

So, get your dancing shoes on and come join the fun!

At ADDENDUM, we wholeheartedly reject all forms of discrimination, including but not limited to age, disability, sex, sexual orientation, pregnancy and maternity, race or ethnicity, religion or belief, gender identity, marriage, civil partnership, or any other protected category. We are committed to fostering a culture of equality and inclusion, where every individual has the opportunity to thrive.

jobs_results.title: Android Developer (Middle/Senior)
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

One Group Digital Solutions OU is an Estonian IT Company that works with developers from Europe.

We provide outsourcing, outstaffing, and custom product development services, which means that we're very flexible with the projects we can assign to you.

Our Company is working on per hour pay conditions with our developers both on Full-Time and Part-Time envolvement.

Job Description

üåè Our company OGD Solutions has opened vacancies for the position of Android Developer

What do we offer:

‚Ä¢Interesting and challenging projects from IT Companies and IT Startups, sometimes we might offer projects not related to IT industry with new products.

‚Ä¢Allow to pick and choose the perfect project and working conditions for you.

‚Ä¢Flexible working hours.

‚Ä¢100% Remote Work.

‚Ä¢We allow you to set a specific Hourly Rate per new projects depending on your responsibilities and how challenging the project is within reasonable budgets.

‚Ä¢Legal agreements to ensure your security.

Required skills:

‚Ä¢ At least 3 years experience as an Android Developer

‚Ä¢ Proven work experience as MVP, Hilt, Room, MediaPlayer, Android Architecture Components

‚Ä¢ Experience with Kotlin Coroutines

‚Ä¢ Good knowledge of Solid principles OOP

‚Ä¢ In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development, and deployment).

‚Ä¢ An ability to perform well in a fast-paced environment.

‚Ä¢ Excellent analytical and multitasking skills.

One Group Digital Solutions OU is an Estonian IT Company that works with developers from Europe.

We provide outsourcing, outstaffing, and custom product development services, which means that we're very flexible with the projects we can assign to you.

Our Company is working on per hour pay conditions with our developers both on Full-Time and Part-Time envolvement.

Apply today and send a CV with your application. We are waiting for you! ‚òÄÔ∏è

jobs_results.title: Android Software Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Summary

Interactive Brokers seeks an Android Software Engineer to develop and optimize mobile trading applications. Strong Java skills, mobile development experience, and passion for creating high-quality solutions are essential. Experience with trading technologies is a plus.

Must Have
‚Ä¢ Strong Java Skills
‚Ä¢ Mobile Development
‚Ä¢ Android Programming
‚Ä¢ Design & Development

Good To Have
‚Ä¢ Trading Technologies
‚Ä¢ Kotlin Experience
‚Ä¢ Performance Optimization
‚Ä¢ Android Studio

Perks
‚Ä¢ Stock Incentive Plan
‚Ä¢ Onsite Lunch

Position

Interactive Brokers is looking for an Android Software Engineer. You will help make our mobile trading applications even better.

If you are proficient in developing mobile applications, have solid Android programming experience, love the challenge of developing award-winning solutions, and enjoy working in a dynamic environment with a strong team, then Interactive Brokers may be just the place for you. This job is heavily oriented towards designing, building and optimizing trading applications.

As a mobile application developer, you'll join a growing team of highly talented and motivated engineers who are passionate about their work. You'll design, code, test, and maintain software solutions with complete ownership throughout this position.

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Components design/implementation in Java and Kotlin for Android
‚Ä¢ Follow specifications closely in a time-sensitive environment and, at the same time, provide constructive feedback that improves overall quality.
‚Ä¢ Utilize best practices and Android Studio to rapidly debug applications, fix performance bottlenecks, and improve client experience.
‚Ä¢ Employ techniques and design patterns to create well-structured, efficient and maintainable code.

Qualifications, Skills & Attributes
‚Ä¢ Strong Java Skills.
‚Ä¢ Technically oriented, proactive, and enthusiastic, with extreme attention to detail.
‚Ä¢ Bachelor's in EE, CS, Math, Physics or similar (masters/ a plus)
‚Ä¢ English written/verbal communication skills.
‚Ä¢ Mobile development experience and/or strong desire to master mobile development for Android.
‚Ä¢ Should be comfortable working in a team reviewing code from other developers and providing guidance and mentoring when appropriate.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with trading technologies is a plus.

Company Benefits & Perks
‚Ä¢ Discretionary, performance-based bonus
‚Ä¢ Vision and dental care benefits, sports activity compensation
‚Ä¢ Stock incentive plan
‚Ä¢ Onsite working, with lunch in the office
‚Ä¢ The benefits package will be reviewed regularly and may be subject to change.

jobs_results.title: Android Engineer - Automotive
jobs_results.description:
WE ARE LOOKING FOR Android Engineer

We are looking for Android Engineer to our team. You will start your journey either in a selected customer project or in Unikie's internal product development team, depending on your profile and available opportunities

Your future colleagues are waiting for you to join our international team. Working with us is uncomplicated, there‚Äôs a good team spirit, low-hierarchy and nonexistent bureaucracy. Our way of working is flexible too, many of our team work remotely from home with visits to our office from time to time when needed. This role is equally challenging, and as such we offer a very good compensation.

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Design and develop modular, scalable infotainment applications on Android Automotive OS.
‚Ä¢ Create design patterns and libraries to facilitate application development.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product and UI/UX design, to define application features.
‚Ä¢ Identify and resolve application bottlenecks for performance optimization.
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews and practice continuous integration and development.
‚Ä¢ Write test code to ensure quality, robustness, and functional correctness, including edge cases.
‚Ä¢ Design and implement application updates and releases.
‚Ä¢ Investigate the Android Automotive OS codebase for better application performance and integration.
‚Ä¢ Develop sample and demo applications utilizing our technology.
‚Ä¢ Engage in continual learning through workshops, conferences, and talks.

Required Qualifications
‚Ä¢ Proven Android application developer with 5+ years of experience.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Kotlin, Java.
‚Ä¢ C++ is nice to have.
‚Ä¢ Ability to manage workload with minimal supervision.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in using Android and Android Jetpack APIs, including general knowledge of Android NDK and JNI.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Android design principles, application interface guidelines, performance, and testing frameworks.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with embedded Android framework services.
‚Ä¢ Experience with developing mapping, multimedia, and Bluetooth solutions is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with push notifications, APIs, and cloud messaging.
‚Ä¢ Excellent coding and proofreading skills.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Agile Scrum practices.
‚Ä¢ Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to collaboratively work with and influence cross-functional teams.

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer - Kotlin
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Estonia

We are looking for an Android developer responsible for the development and maintenance of

applications aimed at a vast number of diverse Android devices. Your primary focus will be the

development of Android applications and their integration with back-end services. You will be

working along-side other engineers and developers working on different layers of the

infrastructure. Therefore, commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design,

and creating quality products is essential.

Responsibilities

‚óè Writing clean and efficient code for Android applications

‚óè Monitoring the performance of live apps and work on optimizing them at the code level

‚óè Identifying and resolving bottlenecks, rectifying bugs and enhancing application

performance

‚óè Performing unit and instrumentation tests on code

‚óè Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define and design new features

‚óè Staying up to date with new mobile technology trends, applications, and protocols

Requirements

You have prior experience as an Android Developer using Kotlin, Java, Android SDK and

reactive programming

‚óè Knowledge of SOLID principles

‚óè You have experience in publishing an application on the Google Play store

‚óè Proven work experience in design patterns mobile architecture using frameworks such

as MVVM/MVC/MVP

‚óè Familiarity with firebase integrations

‚óè Familiarity with RESTful APIs to effectively integrate Android applications

‚óè Understanding of Google‚Äôs Android design principles and interface guidelines

‚óè Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git

‚óè Familiarity with continuous integration (Bitrise, Fastlane, etc)

‚óè Familiarity with various testing tools

‚óè You are a problem solver with good analytical skills

This offer from "Cross Border Talents" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 72% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer - Android
jobs_results.description:
Who we are?

TransferWise was founded in 2011 with a clear mission: Money without borders - so people and businesses can send and receive any currency effortlessly, whenever, wherever.

Sure, the heart of what we do is international money transfer. And we‚Äôre committed to making it instant, convenient and fair for millions of people, all over the world. But we‚Äôre growing our other products and our teams at an exciting pace. And we‚Äôre looking for the very best to jump on board.

What it‚Äôs really like to work here?

At TransferWise, we do things a bit differently. There‚Äôs no corporate nonsense, and no old-fashioned hierarchy. Instead, we work in dozens of self-sufficient, autonomous teams. Think of them like start-ups within a start-up that learn from each other.

Each team picks the problems they want to solve. So there‚Äôs no micro-management. No hiding behind fancy job titles. And no one telling you what to do. You are your own boss. But you‚Äôll get tons of guidance and plenty of support from talented, super-smart colleagues from all over TransferWise.

We‚Äôre going to be upfront ‚Äî the way we work doesn‚Äôt suit everyone. But if freedom, autonomy, and life-affirming, head-scratching professional challenges rock your world, we could be a match made in heaven

What will you be working on?

We‚Äôre looking for a seasoned Android developer to join our mobile team. You‚Äôll be a self-starter with the ability to take on a range of hard and intriguing challenges. You will work on mobile apps, focusing on our app for Android devices, but also on the API and services that power the app. You will ensure that TransferWise has the best mobile experience and together we will show the banks how mobile financial services are really done!

Must have:
‚Ä¢ Full Android stack: Activities, Fragments, Views, Services, Broadcast Receivers, Content Providers, SQLite etc.
‚Ä¢ Experience of commonly used Android libraries both from Google and third parties, for, amongst other things: persistence; multi-threading; messaging; code reduction; and optimisation.
‚Ä¢ Experience of commonly used Android testing libraries for both unit testing and functional testing
‚Ä¢ Experience with TDD and creating clean, testable code
‚Ä¢ A strong understanding of REST API Design

Bonus Points:
‚Ä¢ Experience developing on a back-end MVC Framework
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with iOS
‚Ä¢ Writing blog posts about technology, taking part in open source projects and talking at conferences
‚Ä¢ Experience with new languages such as Kotlin

Mindset:
‚Ä¢ Passionate about technology, product and user experience.
‚Ä¢ Ability to work independently and plan your own solutions to problems.
‚Ä¢ Broad understanding of the concept of minimum viable product and conversion rates.
‚Ä¢ You put the customer at the heart of everything you do and that empathy drives every decision you make.
‚Ä¢ Understanding: able to nurture and grow other devs, providing constructive feedback
‚Ä¢ Keeps up with all the latest developments from the Android community in order to stay ahead of the ever changing development trends
‚Ä¢ Exhibit a strong belief that untested code is broken code

For a sneak - peek into our Engineering world check: http://tech.transferwise.com/

Want to know more?

To find out a bit more about the cool stuff you are going to work on and what it‚Äôs like to work at TransferWise plus a full run through of our employee benefits - visit our careers page. Not from Estonia - no worries, we will support your relocation to the lovely Tallinn, from any part of the world! :)

jobs_results.title: Mid/Senior Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
About the Company:

Addendum is a global software development and IT team augmentation firm specializing in fintech, banking, and telco industries.

We offer tailored benefits, diverse projects with various tech stacks, and opportunities for growth, freedom, and responsibility you desire.
About the Role:

You will join forces with dedicated professionals in the banking sector to work on exciting projects that focus on advancing and supporting the development of a mobile application.

This is a contract-based role for a duration of 3 months.
Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Develop high-quality native Android applications using Java and/or Kotlin.
‚Ä¢ Design and implement solutions that prioritize performance, security, and exceptional user experience.
‚Ä¢ Stay updated with and apply the latest trends and best practices in user interface and user experience design.
‚Ä¢ Maintain high code quality standards while actively sharing knowledge with the team.
‚Ä¢ Provide mentorship and guidance to junior Android developers.
Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in developing native Android applications.
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of Android architecture, design patterns, and best practices for app development.
‚Ä¢ Expertise in creating secure, high-performance solutions with a focus on user experience (UX) and user interface (UI).
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of modern tools and practices, including version control systems (e.g., Git) and Agile methodologies.
‚Ä¢ Attention to detail in maintaining clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
‚Ä¢ Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset to share knowledge and contribute to team success.
What We Offer:

Salary: ‚Ç¨20-‚Ç¨35 per hour (flexible based on experience)

We provide personalized benefits packages tailored to your unique passions. Additionally, we offer:
‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours
‚Ä¢ Top talent collaboration
‚Ä¢ Diverse and challenging projects
‚Ä¢ Epic team events
‚Ä¢ Special celebrations

Optional additional benefits include rock star perks, flexible work options, and healthy work-life balance.

We reject all forms of discrimination and strive to foster a culture of equality and inclusion where every individual has the opportunity to thrive.

jobs_results.title: FLUTTER DEVELOPER
Senior Mobile Developer - Android
jobs_results.description:
TransferWise is one the fastest growing companies in Europe and we‚Äôre on a mission: to make money without borders the new normal. We‚Äôve got 8 million customers across the globe and we‚Äôre growing. Fast.

Current banking systems don't let us send, spend or receive money across borders easily. Or quickly. Or cheaply.

So, we‚Äôre building a new one.

And, we‚Äôre looking for a Senior Android developer to join our mission and help provide our customers with the best mobile experience possible.

What does it take?
‚Ä¢ A passion for technology, product and user experience
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Continuous Delivery approach
‚Ä¢ The ability to work independently and plan your own solutions to problems
‚Ä¢ Thinking from the customer perspective and putting them at the heart of everything you do

Is that you?
‚Ä¢ Great communication skills and the ability to articulate complex, technical concepts to non-technical audience
‚Ä¢ Experience building Android apps that delight users
‚Ä¢ Full-stack Android development (Activities, Fragments, Views, Services, Broadcast Receivers, Content Providers, SQLite, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Experience with Android libraries (such as Android ViewModels, Room DB, RxJava, Kotlin Flows, Android Navigation, Dagger DI, Gson, Kotlin X, Retrofit etc.)
‚Ä¢ The desire for creating clean, testable code
‚Ä¢ Practical experience of SOLID principles and when and how to apply them
‚Ä¢ Experience working with a version control system like git
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of REST API Design

‚Ä¶but don‚Äôt worry we don‚Äôt expect you to know everything!

What the first six months in this role will look like:
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll have onboarded and found your place through understanding your team and guild vision and how you can contribute
‚Ä¢ Understanding the Fintech domain and our tech culture
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll have fully developed new features, from planning to release, and keep monitoring their adoption once live
‚Ä¢ Gone through two quarterly plannings and proposed ideas to take your product further

What you get back:
‚Ä¢ The autonomy to solve problems your way
‚Ä¢ The freedom to have real impact
‚Ä¢ Loads of development opportunities
‚Ä¢ A fun work environment with social activities and events

And more‚Ä¶ Check out our offer here.

Interested? Find out more:
‚Ä¢ How we work - a practical guide
‚Ä¢ TransferWise Vlogs: Omar, Engineering Lead
‚Ä¢ Engineering team blog
‚Ä¢ How our Engineers build new features

We‚Äôre people without borders ‚Äî without judgement or prejudice, too. We want to work with the best people, no matter their background. So if you‚Äôre passionate about learning new things and keen to join our mission, you‚Äôll fit right in.

Also, qualifications aren‚Äôt that important to us. If you‚Äôve got great experience, and you‚Äôre great at articulating your thinking, we‚Äôd like to hear from you.

And because we believe that diverse teams build better products, we‚Äôd especially love to hear from you if you‚Äôre from an under-represented demographic.
